ModMetaData.name: Meaningful Parties
ModMetaData.author: winggar
ModMetaData.description:
Wish you knew why your pawns were partying the night away? So did I, so I whipped up this mod in a few hours.
Without changing the frequency of parties, colonists will now throw parties over any of nearly 100 party causes, including: - a colonist or bonded animal's birthday - the survival of a major raid - settling a new tile - researching beer brewing - a colonist recovering from alcohol addiction - dodging a falling ceiling - the end of a volcanic winter - sacrificing a prisoner - embracing the void ... and many more
This mod includes support for Vanilla Events Expanded's purple events, and as far as I can tell is compatible with Days Matter.
